name: Her (itch) (queerlich)
description:
"Her" is a short, interactive, linear, text-based story made with Twine by Maverick! CW: mentions of blood in this story

It is a somewhat abstract experience that describes the impact of a supernatural being on the (unnamed) genderless protagonist to talk about grief. This story was written from a queer perspective, so if you talk about this story with others, just keep that in mind when referring to the protagonist or others. Feel free to make your own meanings and interpretations! However, if you scroll to the bottom of this page you can read about the perspective from which I wrote this story. So, spoilers!

The screenshots show the colour scheme and format of this Twine story to help you decide if it's legible enough. You can donate either here on Itch or on my Ko-Fi if you enjoyed this game and would like to support my existence.

This story will not be updated further, but I will upload other stories as they come to me.

What You'll Need

A browser and a device to launch that browser. If you are using a touch screen device: you'll also need something to click the screen with (finger, pen, etc.) If your desktop: likely your mouse.

Played through and are confused on what it's about? SPOILERS! In a sense I wrote this through the perspective of someone who is constantly chasing a partner who left them. When grief, and perhaps bitterness, of them moving on consumes you. Instead of accepting new partners for who they are, you are constantly chasing the person who left. Looking for traces of them in others, versus finding healing for yourself.
